Scorpions can be assigned as a slayer task at level 7 combat by various low end slayer masters and are generally meant as tasks for beginners. Scorpions attack with melee and a few certain varieties are capable of poisoning. Interestingly various fightable lobsters also counts as scorpions. Scorpions have very limited drop tables, usually only dropping ensouled scorpion heads and beginner clue scrolls.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Grave scorpion 12 7
  • Grave of Scorpius
  • Lowest level variant of scorpions.
Scorpion 14 17
  • Al Kharid Mine
  • Ardougne Zoo
  • Cairn Isle
  • Dwarven Mine
  • Karamja Volcano
  • Kharazi Jungle
  • Scorpion Pit
  • Temple of Ikov
  • Varrock Sewers
  • Wilderness (West of the Air Obelisk)
  • Standard scorpions, most common variant.
Scorpia's offspring 15 2
  • Scorpion Pit
  • Attacks with powerful ranged attacks, capable of draining prayer and induces poison beginning at 6. Only found in Scorpia's Lair in the Wilderness.
Poison scorpion 20 23
  • Taverley Dungeon
  • North Brimhaven mine
  • Can induce poison beginning at 3.
Pit Scorpion 28 32
  • Ardougne Zoo
  • Legends' Guild dungeon
King Scorpion 32 30
  • Crandor
  • Dwarven Mine
  • Lava Maze
  • Lovakite Mine
  • Higher level variant, usually found in mines.
Giant lobster 32 32
  • Shipwreck north-west of Port Phasmatys
  • Fought during Ghosts Ahoy, can only be fought once.
Scorpion 37 37
  • Pit of Pestilence
  • Requires partial completion of the Stronghold of Security.
Scorpion 38 15
  • Ape Atoll
  • Kruk's Dungeon
  • Very strong and always aggressive unless holding an enchanted monkey greegree or completion of Monkey Madness II. Can induce poison beginning at 1. Ape Atoll requires partial completion of Monkey Madness I. Kruk's Dungeon requires partial completion of Monkey Madness II.
Giant lobster 45 50
  • Witchhaven Dungeon
  • Can only be fought during Slug Menace, but not after.
Scorpia's guardian 47 70
  • Scorpion Pit
  • Summoned by Scorpia to heal her in fights. Only found in Scorpia's Lair in the Wilderness.
Scorpion 59 57
  • Pit of Pestilence
Lobstrosity 68 50
  • Underwater
  • Requires completion of Bone Voyage.
  • Only found underwater where limited weapons are usable: Merfolk trident, trident of the seas/swamp, brine sabre, magic secateurs or magic.
  • Players must maintain their oxygen level by use of air bubbles or pufferfish.
Scorpia 225 260
  • Scorpion Pit
  • A boss monster found in her lair in the Wilderness.
  • For more information on fighting Scorpia, see Scorpia/Strategies.
Reanimated scorpion N/A 35
  • Dark Altar
  • Requires 60% Arceuus favour to access the Arceuus spellbook. Requires ensouled scorpion head, 4 Body runes, 2 Nature runes, and level 16 Magic to cast Basic Reanimation. The spell must be cast at the Dark Altar unless it is cast when the ensouled head is received as a drop.
